Title: 🎬 ⚠️ The division commander cannot imagine the additional models...
Description: ⚠️ The division commander is expected not to rely on additional mock-ups of anti-aircraft missile systems, or rather to kidnap people and real equipment in the face of a potential enemy strike. And you and I didn’t give them such strength by collecting their bones, increasing their nutrition and gaining the respect of strangers who are ready to lend their shoulder to the Insurgent Forces.❗️Current mock-up of the F-16, Patriot, Iris-T and Nasams is important Experience real combat equipment from several tens of meters. Therefore, we were shocked by the feasibility of strengthening the direct passive defense. Thanks to everyone who helps! Title: 🔁🖼 ⚡️ 29 STRIKE UAVs KILLED ➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖ On the 15th of September...
Description: Forwarded From Commander of the Military Forces Mikola Oleshchuk⚡️ 29 STRIKE UAVs KILLED➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖➖On September 15, 2024, the enemy was hit by 3 armored aircraft missiles X- 59 from the vast expanse of the Kursk region - Russian Federation. and 29 attack UAVs of the Shahed type from the regions of Primorsko-Akhtars, Yeisk, Kursk - Russian Federation.💥 As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, the destruction of mobile fire groups of the Ukrainian Defense Forces, aviation, anti-aircraft missiles and by the means of the REB of the Povitryanih Forces, 29 enemy UAVs were shot down from Mykolayiv, Cherkassy, ​​Kirovograd, Kherson, Zaporizhzhya, Sumy, Chernigiv and Kiev regions. Thank you for your combat work!🇺🇦 Together - to victory!➖➖➖➖ ➖➖➖➖➖➖🦅 Commander of the Air Force, Lieutenant General Mykola Oleshchuk
